attributes.action: Reduce Council Tax! The second largest house hold bill after rent/mortgage
attributes.additional_details: We pay so many taxes monthly to increase the council tax again, while the government have a pay increase just isn’t right! I want them to review the council tax and look at how it can be reduced across the country! We are taxed on everything and the bills are going up! A 3.75 per cent increase in council tax is not inline with my wages.
attributes.background: I want the government to reduce our council tax instead of the government having a pay rise for themselves!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Council tax rates are set by individual councils, 

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You may be interested in signing this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301594
